name: ngx-dino
description: Visualization framework and library for Angular 6+
author: Cyberinfrastructure for Network Science Center at Indiana University (http://cns.iu.edu/)

scripts.version-patch: npm version --no-git-tag-version patch && cd projects/core && for p in core vega-util datatable force-network geomap scatterplot science-map legend network; do cd ../$p && npm version --no-git-tag-version patch; done;
scripts.version-minor: npm version --no-git-tag-version minor && cd projects/core && for p in core vega-util datatable force-network geomap scatterplot science-map legend network; do cd ../$p && npm version --no-git-tag-version minor; done;
scripts.version-major: npm version --no-git-tag-version major && cd projects/core && for p in core vega-util datatable force-network geomap scatterplot science-map legend network; do cd ../$p && npm version --no-git-tag-version major; done;
scripts.build:release: npm run build:libs-release && npm run build:demo-release
scripts.build:libs-release: for p in core vega-util datatable force-network geomap scatterplot science-map legend network; do npm run build:lib $p; done
scripts.publish: npm run publish:cp-readme && npm run publish:libs
scripts.publish:cp-readme: for p in core vega-util datatable force-network geomap scatterplot science-map legend network; do cp projects/$p/LICENSE dist/$p && cp -f projects/$p/README.md dist/$p; done
scripts.publish:libs: cd dist/core && for p in core vega-util datatable force-network geomap scatterplot science-map legend network; do cd ../$p && npm publish --access public; done
